metadata.description: Official marketplace for Claude Code Extensions - Modular plugins for every tech stack

plugins.name: cce-core
plugins.description: Essential Claude Code extensions: core agents, hooks, commands, and universal tools

plugins.name: cce-kubernetes
plugins.description: Kubernetes cluster operations, health diagnostics, and operator-specific agents

plugins.name: cce-cloudflare
plugins.description: Cloudflare Workers, AI, Workflows, and VPC services development

plugins.name: cce-esphome
plugins.description: ESPHome IoT development for ESP32/ESP8266 with Home Assistant integration

plugins.name: cce-homeassistant
plugins.description: Home Assistant Lovelace dashboard configuration, card selection, and theme customization

plugins.name: cce-web-react
plugins.description: React, Next.js, and TanStack Start development

plugins.name: cce-research
plugins.description: Deep research coordination: academic papers, technical analysis, data insights, and web intelligence

plugins.name: cce-web-vue
plugins.description: Vue.js and Nuxt.js development with Composition API, composables, and SSR/SSG patterns

plugins.name: cce-typescript
plugins.description: TypeScript and frontend tooling including Braintrust testing and fumadocs documentation

plugins.name: cce-go
plugins.description: Go development following Google Go style guide with Go 1.25+ features and best practices

plugins.name: cce-anthropic
plugins.description: Anthropic Claude Agent SDK development for Python and TypeScript autonomous agents

plugins.name: cce-grafana
plugins.description: Grafana plugin development and billing metrics analysis for Prometheus and Loki

plugins.name: cce-django
plugins.description: Django backend development suite: models, views, DRF APIs, GraphQL, and ORM optimization for professional Django projects

plugins.name: cce-temporal
plugins.description: Temporal.io workflow development across Python, Go, and TypeScript SDKs with testing and troubleshooting

plugins.name: cce-devops
plugins.description: DevOps tooling: GitHub Actions, Helm, ArgoCD, and Crossplane for CI/CD and infrastructure

plugins.name: cce-ai
plugins.description: AI/ML development: LLM architecture, prompt engineering, ML ops, and NLP with production deployment focus

plugins.name: cce-python
plugins.description: Python CLI development with Typer for type-hint driven applications, validation, and testing
